questions.text: Which 2–3 areas from above are you most eager to grow in? Why?

What kind of support would help you most?
 (Choose up to 2)
Are there any specific skills or tools you’d like to learn (e.g., Airtable, Notion, Canva, Miro, grant writing, etc.)?
How do you prefer to communicate? (Select all that apply)
How often would you like to receive feedback or recognition for your contributions?
What motivates you to stay engaged? (Choose top 2)
What kind of team dynamic helps you do your best work?

Are there any types of tasks or responsibilities you would prefer not to do or absolutely do not want to do?
 (e.g., cold emailing, budgeting, public speaking, data entry, social media management, etc.)
Any additional comments, concerns, or ideas?

submission_info.title: Submission & Next Steps
content: Your responses will help us co-design your role and task areas.
Expect to review a role description and working agreement draft in the coming weeks.
We’ll check in monthly to refine based on how you're feeling and progressing.
